episodes.title: La Basura en su Lugar
episodes.plot: Doña Florinda forces Don Ramón to clean and sweep the patio, but every time he gets the job done, Chavo, Chilindrina and Quico make a mess again and he has to start all over again.

episodes.title: Cubriendo al repartidor
episodes.plot: Don Ramón is replacing temporarily the milkman. Just when he thinks he finally is catching a break and earning money, Chavo and Chilindrina use his milk bottles to feed newborn puppies.

episodes.title: El pollo asado
episodes.plot: Doña Cleotilde cooks a chicken and leaves it in her window. Chilindrina recruits Chavo and Quico to steal it, and then she eats the entire chicken. After she falls sick due to indigestion, she refuses to take her medicine.

episodes.title: La nueva profesión - parte 1
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: La nueva profesión - parte 2
episodes.plot: Don Ramón is painting his chairs on the patio with a horrible yellow paint. Thanks to the impertinence of Chavo, everyone ends up covered in paint.

episodes.title: ¡Qué golpiza! - parte 3
episodes.plot: Doña Florinda thinks there is a bull loose in the neighborhood. When she hugs Don Ramón while she's scared, Jirafales sees them together and thinks she is now in love with Don Ramón. Jealous, Jirafales challenges Don Ramón to a duel.

episodes.title: Piratas y barquitos de papel

episodes.title: La siembra de un huevo
episodes.plot: The kids leave the patio covered in dirt. Don Ramón and Mr. Barriga make them clean the patio, but every time Chavo and Chilindrina complete the task, Quico throws more dirt while they're looking away.

episodes.title: Exámenes - parte 2

episodes.title: La venta de la vecindad - parte 1
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: La venta de la vecindad - parte 2
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Ropa sucia
episodes.plot: When Doña Florinda returns to the neighborhood from the beauty parlor, she fights with Don Ramón because he refuses to remove his pants from the clothesline. Doña Florinda takes revenge when she gives Don Ramón's pants to Chavo.

episodes.title: Fútbol americano
episodes.plot: Don Ramón invites Chavo over for breakfast, but Chilindrina broke all the eggs. She offers her savings to buy more eggs. In the meantime, Jirafales gives Ping Pong paddles and balls to Quico as a gift, and Quico invites Chavo to play.

episodes.title: Los sombreros
episodes.plot: Chavo is still waiting for breakfast, but something happens to the eggs. Chavo, Quico and Ñoño play a few -not so friendly- Ping Pong matches.

episodes.title: La invitación a desayunar - parte 2
episodes.plot: Ñoño takes his ping-pong table to the neighborhood to play with the rackets and balls that Quico won. Meanwhile, Don Ramón tries to prepare Chavo's breakfast.

episodes.title: El globero
episodes.plot: Don Ramón decides to try a new business: selling balloons. But things don't go very well - And the children start fighting over the balloons.

episodes.title: Los sombreros
episodes.plot: El Chavo smears the gum on the hat of Don Ramón's boss. Frightened, he tries to remove the gum with scissors and ends up making a huge hole in the hat.

episodes.title: El sorteo de la lotería
episodes.plot: Don Ramón discovers that the lottery ticket he bought from El Chavo was the big winner. The problem is that the refund was lost and now he needs to find it.

episodes.title: Clases de animales
episodes.plot: Chavo, Chilindrina and Quico are late for school and decide to run. Ñoño is also late and Don Ramón takes him to school. Once the class starts, Profesor Jirafales asks questions to his pupils, only to realize they are completely clueless.

episodes.title: La muñequita prieta de La Chilindrina
episodes.plot: Quico will have to go to a very important party and he can't get his sailor suit dirty. Then, Chilindrina decides to throw talcum powder on it so as not to go to such a celebration.

episodes.title: Episode #4.29

episodes.title: Episode #4.30
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Episode #4.31
episodes.plot: Doña Cleotilde has a new dog named 'Satanás'. When she calls the puppy by name, the kids think that she is calling the Devil (they think that she is a witch). They also think that the stick she uses to play with her dog is a magic wand.

episodes.title: Episode #4.32
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Episode #4.33

episodes.title: Episode #4.34
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Episode #4.35
episodes.plot: Chavo and Quico think that 'The Invisible Man' is in the neighborhood. When Chilindrina sees them, she decides to trick them, and tells them that her dad actually has a formula for invisibility, making Quico drink a nasty potion.

episodes.title: Episode #4.36
episodes.plot: Someone is stealing things in the neighborhood. When one stolen object appears inside Chavo's barrel everyone accuses him of being a thief. He decides to leave the neighborhood for good but even in his absence, the real thief remains there.

episodes.title: Episode #4.37
episodes.plot: Chilindrina collects donations for the Red Cross. When Don Ramón sees Quico playing The Red Cross game he thinks that Quico is crazy, but this gives him an idea: he will pretend that he is insane and Mr. Barriga won't demand the rent money.

episodes.title: Episode #4.38
episodes.plot: Know what this is about? Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Episode #4.39
episodes.plot: It's holiday season, and the neighborhood is ready to celebrate the December festivities. Don Ramón, Mr. Barriga and Doña Florinda buy three piñatas for the first party, but the clumsy Chavo breaks all three.

episodes.title: Episode #4.40
episodes.plot: Everybody in the neighborhood is filled with the spirit of the holidays, all rivalries are forgotten (at least for Christmas and New Year), and they wish each other the best with songs, even Don Ramón and Doña Florinda.

episodes.title: Ayuda a tus semejantes
episodes.plot: When Don Ramón realizes that Quico spends a lot of money buying balloons, he decides to get several to sell them to Quico. Don Ramón and Chilindrina recruit Chavo to burst the balloons, this way Quico will have to buy more.
